title: Boeing increases use of 3D printing to speed up production of WGS military satellite
summary: Boeing is 3D printing more than a thousand parts for WGS-11+, a new communications satellite it is producing for the U.S. Space Force

title: Ukraine official confirms urgent request for Western satellite data
summary: "Within one hour, there will be an attack on Kyiv again."

title: Russia looks to China for collaboration in space but faces isolation over Ukraine invasion
summary: Roscosmos is looking to China as a supplier of components and a partner in missions following the invasion of Ukraine, but sanctions could still heavily impact any new plans.

title: SpaceX awarded three more NASA astronaut launch contracts
summary: Three months after announcing its intent, NASA has procured three more Crew Dragon astronaut launches from SpaceX, raising the total number of...

title: ISS operations remain normal ahead of private astronaut mission
summary: NASA said that operations of the International Space Station remain normal despite the growing rift between Russia and the West in response to Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.
